Class DirSupport

java.lang.Object
  |

public class DirSupport
extends java.lang.Object

A class offering support for working with directories.

Version:
$Revision: 1.1.1.1 $
Author:
$Author: jwoehr $

instance

public void instance(java.lang.String dirName)
Instance or re-instance the DirSupport on a named dir. Discards previous instancing and all related data. Dir locks are freed by calling System.gc()

Refresh the list of entries.
